metadata.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react to the Gith skeleton on the Monastery roof. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: load up CRE_Main_Ago to 45; 31; 19interact with the skeleton

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Only bones and armour left. Must've been part of the original raiding party.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Looks like a githyanki, if the armour is anything to go by.
